Source.Name: ADS
Source.Description: UK-based service specializing in the preservation and dissemination of archaeological research data.

Source.Name: SND
Source.Description: Sweden's national platform for managing and sharing research data across various disciplines.

Source.Name: Nara Research Institute
Source.Description: Japanese research center dedicated to the preservation and study of cultural heritage and archaeological discoveries.
Source.Full_name: Nara National Research Institute for Cultural Properties

Source.Name: Digital Antiquity
Source.Description: US-based organization managing tDAR, a database focused on the digital preservation of archaeological archives and cultural resources.
Source.Full_name: Digital Antiquity (The Digital Archaeological Record - tDAR)

Source.Name: CONICET
Source.Description: Argentina's leading research organization, supporting various scientific disciplines, including archaeology.
Source.Full_name: National Scientific and Technical Research Council

Source.Name: SEAD
Source.Description: A Swedish national resource for environmental archaeology data.

Source.Name: AIS-CR
Source.Description: National archaeological database and information system of the Czech Republic.
Source.Full_name: Archaeological Information System of the Czech Republic
Source.Provider: Institute of Archaeology, Czech Academy of Sciences

Source.Name: Inrap
Source.Description: France's leading institution for preventive archaeology, responsible for safeguarding the nation's archaeological heritage.
Source.Full_name: Institut national de recherches archéologiques préventives

Source.Name: DOAJ
Source.Description: An online directory that indexes and provides access to high-quality, open-access, peer-reviewed journals.

Source.Name: BASE
Source.Description: One of the world's largest search engines for academic web resources, especially for open-access content.

Source.Name: DNB
Source.Description: The German National Library, responsible for collecting and preserving all German-language publications.

Source.Name: RECYT
Source.Description: Spanish repository for science and technology, managed by FECYT, providing access to scientific data and publications.
Source.Full_name: Repositorio Español de Ciencia y Tecnología
Source.Provider: FECYT (Fundación Española para la Ciencia y la Tecnología)

Source.Name: Isidore
Source.Description: A platform providing access to digital data in humanities and social sciences.
Source.Full_name: Integration Services, interconnection of Data of the Research and Education

Source.Name: EKT
Source.Description: Greece's National Documentation Centre, responsible for archiving and providing access to a wide range of scientific and cultural resources.
Source.Full_name: Εθνικό Κέντρο Τεκμηρίωσης & Ηλεκτρονικού Περιεχομένου (National Documentation Centre of Greece)

Source.Name: HRCAK
Source.Description: The central Croatian portal for open-access scientific journals.
Source.Full_name: HRCAK Portal of Scientific Journals of Croatia

Source.Name: OpenEdition
Source.Description: A French open-access platform for journals, books, and research blogs in the humanities and social sciences.
Source.Provider: OpenEdition (CLEO - Centre for Open Electronic Publishing)

Source.Name: COIMBRA/Pombolina
Source.Description: Portugal's University of Coimbra's digital library providing access to academic and scientific documents.

Source.Name: CLARIN
Source.Description: European research infrastructure providing access to language resources and technology.
Source.Full_name: Common Language Resources and Technology Infrastructure

Source.Name: CESSDA
Source.Description: European research infrastructure providing access to data in the social sciences.
Source.Full_name: Consortium of European Social Science Data Archives

Source.Name: ZRC SAZU
Source.Description: Slovenia’s leading research institute in the humanities and social sciences.
Source.Full_name: Znanstvenoraziskovalni center Slovenske akademije znanosti in umetnosti (Research Centre of the Slovenian Academy of Sciences and Arts)

Source.Name: Econstor
Source.Description: A platform providing open-access publications in economics.
Source.Provider: ZBW – Leibniz Information Centre for Economics

Source.Name: OpenAIRE
Source.Description: A European infrastructure supporting open access to research outputs and fostering open science.
Source.Full_name: Open Access Infrastructure for Research in Europe

Source.Name: Biblioteka Nauki
Source.Description: A Polish platform providing open access to scientific publications in various fields.
Source.Provider: Interdisciplinary Centre for Mathematical and Computational Modelling (ICM), University of Warsaw

Source.Name: DH Publications (dblp)
Source.Description: A bibliography for computer science publications, indexing research papers from various sources.
Source.Provider: Schloss Dagstuhl – Leibniz Center for Informatics

Source.Name: CLARIN Resource Families
Source.Description: Provides access to language resources, categorized into families for easier search and discovery.

Source.Name: TAPoR
Source.Description: A portal offering tools and resources for text analysis, designed for humanities scholars.

Source.Name: SSK Zotero Resources
Source.Description: A collection of Zotero-based resources to assist with standardization in research.

Source.Name: Humanities Data
Source.Description: A platform for accessing various data sets in the humanities.

Source.Name: The Programming Historian
Source.Description: Offers tutorials and resources for digital tools and techniques in historical research.

Source.Name: DARIAH Campus
Source.Description: A platform offering open educational resources for digital humanities research.

Source.Name: CESSDA (trainings)
Source.Description: Provides access to training resources for social science data archives.

Source.Name: Language Resource Switchboard
Source.Description: Tool for processing and analyzing language resources by linking them to relevant tools.

Source.Name: Standardisation Survival Kit
Source.Description: Provides resources for understanding and implementing standards in social sciences and humanities research.

Source.Name: EOSC Catalogue
Source.Description: Previously provided access to services and resources from the European Open Science Cloud.

Source.Name: SSHOC Service Catalogue
Source.Description: Previously provided services for research in the social sciences and humanities.
Source.Full_name: SSH Open Cloud Project Service Catalogue

Source.Name: DARIAH contribution tool
Source.Description: Previously facilitated in-kind contributions to the DARIAH research infrastructure.

Source.Name: ARCHE
Source.Description: Offers access to digital humanities resources, with a focus on Austrian cultural heritage.
Source.Full_name: A Resource Centre for the HumanitiEs
Source.Provider: Austrian Centre for Digital Humanities and Cultural Heritage (ACDH-CH)

Source.Name: BAS
Source.Description: Provides access to speech signal data from various research projects.

Source.Name: BBAW
Source.Description: A research institute providing access to linguistic and historical resources.
Source.Full_name: Berlin-Brandenburg Academy of Sciences and Humanities

Source.Name: CKL2CORPORA
Source.Description: Provides expertise and resources related to learner corpora for research purposes.
Source.Full_name: CLARIN Knowledge Centre for Learner Corpora

Source.Name: CLARIN Latvia
Source.Description: Provides access to language resources and tools related to the Latvian language.
Source.Full_name: CLARIN Centre of Latvian language resources and tools

Source.Name: CLARIN Switzerland (LaRS)
Source.Description: Provides access to language resources and tools in Switzerland.

Source.Name: CLARIN-IS
Source.Description: Provides access to Icelandic language resources.

Source.Name: CLARIN-LT
Source.Description: Provides Lithuanian language resources and tools for research.

Source.Name: CLARIN-PL
Source.Description: Offers tools and resources for Polish language research.

Source.Name: CLARIN.SI
Source.Description: Provides Slovenian language resources and tools.

Source.Name: CLARIN:EL
Source.Description: Offers Greek language resources and technologies for language processing and research.
Source.Full_name: CLARIN National Infrastructure for Language Resources & Technologies in Greece

Source.Name: CLARINO Bergen Center
Source.Description: Provides Norwegian language resources and tools for research.

Source.Name: CLARINO Text Laboratory Centre
Source.Description: Provides access to tools for text analysis and natural language processing.

Source.Name: Center of Estonian Language Resources
Source.Description: Provides access to Estonian language resources and tools.

Source.Name: CLST
Source.Description: Offers speech and language resources, with a focus on speech technology.
Source.Full_name: Centre for Language and Speech Technology

Source.Name: CEDIFOR
Source.Description: Provides digital resources and services for research in humanities and social sciences.
Source.Full_name: Centre for the Digital Foundation of Research in the Humanities, Social, and Educational Sciences

Source.Name: COCOON
Source.Description: A French platform offering access to digital oral corpora.

Source.Name: CNC
Source.Description: Provides access to large-scale linguistic data for the Czech language.

Source.Name: DARIAH-DE Repository
Source.Description: A repository for digital humanities resources as part of the DARIAH-DE initiative.

Source.Name: DANS
Source.Description: Provides a repository for storing and sharing research data, with a focus on social sciences and humanities.

Source.Name: Eberhard Karls Universität Tübingen
Source.Description: Offers digital linguistic resources and services.

Source.Name: Eurac Research CLARIN Centre
Source.Description: Provides access to language resources and tools, with a focus on minority languages.

Source.Name: HZSK
Source.Description: Offers access to language corpora and linguistic research data.

Source.Name: IMS Stuttgart
Source.Description: Focuses on research in computational linguistics and speech processing.

Source.Name: INT
Source.Description: Offers Dutch language resources for research.

Source.Name: LINDAT/CLARIAH-CZ
Source.Description: Provides language technology and digital humanities tools.

Source.Name: LAC
Source.Description: Offers access to linguistic resources, particularly for endangered languages.

Source.Name: GEI
Source.Description: Specializes in digital education resources.
Source.Full_name: Leibniz Institute for Educational Media | Georg Eckert Institute

Source.Name: IDS Mannheim
Source.Description: Provides access to resources on the German language.

Source.Name: LU Humanities Lab
Source.Description: Offers tools and resources for research in the humanities, focusing on digital methods.

Source.Name: MPI Psycholinguistics
Source.Description: Specializes in language processing and cognitive research.

Source.Name: Phonothèque MMSH
Source.Description: Provides access to audio archives of cultural and historical significance in the Mediterranean (http://phonotheque.mmsh.huma-num.fr is obsolet)
Source.Full_name: Phonothèque Mediterranean Research Centre for the Humanities

Source.Name: Meertens Instituut/HuC
Source.Description: Specializes in the study and documentation of Dutch language and culture.

Source.Name: National Library of Norway
Source.Description: Offers access to a wide range of linguistic resources, including historical texts.

Source.Name: ORTOLANG
Source.Description: Provides access to linguistic resources and tools for the French language.
Source.Full_name: Open Resources and TOols for LANGuage

Source.Name: OTA
Source.Description: Provides access to literary and linguistic resources for research purposes.

Source.Name: PORTULAN CLARIN
Source.Description: Provides language resources and tools for Portuguese language research.
Source.Full_name: PORTULAN CLARIN Research Infrastructure for the Science and Technology of Language

Source.Name: PolMine
Source.Description: Offers political discourse corpora and tools for analysis.

Source.Name: SAW Leipzig
Source.Description: Provides access to linguistic resources and tools, with a focus on historical corpora.

Source.Name: SADiLaR
Source.Description: Provides access to linguistic resources and tools for African languages.
Source.Full_name: South African Centre for Digital Language Resources

Source.Name: Språkbanken
Source.Description: Offers linguistic resources and tools for the Swedish language.

Source.Name: TextGrid
Source.Description: Provides digital tools and repositories for humanities research.

Source.Name: CLARIN Copenhagen
Source.Description: Provides linguistic resources and tools for research, focused on the Danish language, as well as other Scandinavian languages
Source.Full_name: CLARIN Centre at the University of Copenhagen

Source.Name: ILC4CLARIN
Source.Description: Offers computational tools and linguistic resources.
Source.Full_name: ILC4CLARIN Centre at the Institute for Computational Linguistics

Source.Name: TROLLing
Source.Description: Repository for linguistic research data, focusing on data sharing for the linguistics community.
Source.Full_name: The Tromsø Repository of Language and Linguistics

Source.Name: Universität des Saarlandes
Source.Description: Offers linguistic research data and tools through CLARIN-D.

Source.Name: ZIM Centre for Information Modelling
Source.Description: Provides access to research data in digital humanities, focusing on information modelling and data curation at the University of Graz.

Source.Name: B2SHARE
Source.Description: A tool for storing and sharing research data across various disciplines.

Source.Name: CLLE ERSS
Source.Description: A research center focusing on language, cognition, and computational linguistics.
Source.Full_name: CLLE ERSS Université de Toulouse Le Mirail

Source.Name: California Language Archive
Source.Description: A digital repository for linguistic field recordings and research materials.

Source.Name: ELRA
Source.Description: Provides access to a wide range of linguistic resources for research and development in language technologies.

Source.Name: Europeana
Source.Description: A digital platform for cultural heritage, providing access to millions of books, artworks, and other artifacts from European libraries, museums, and archives.

Source.Name: e-codices
Source.Description: Provides online access to medieval and early modern manuscripts from Swiss libraries and archives.
Source.Full_name: e-codices - Virtual Manuscript Library of Switzerland

Source.Name: PARADISEC
Source.Description: Provides access to recordings, transcripts, and materials documenting endangered languages and cultures.
Source.Full_name: Pacific And Regional Archive for Digital Sources in Endangered Cultures

Source.Name: LDC Corpus Catalog
Source.Description: Offers linguistic data resources for research in language technology, speech processing, and machine learning.

Source.Name: LINGUIST List
Source.Description: An international online resource for linguistic information, including datasets and tools for language research.

Source.Name: The Rosetta Project
Source.Description: Provides access to a long-term archive of human languages, especially focusing on endangered and lesser-known languages.
Source.Full_name: The Rosetta Project - A Long Now Foundation

Source.Name: University of the Basque Country
Source.Description: Provides linguistic research materials, especially focusing on Basque and other regional languages.

Source.Name: WALS
Source.Description: A database that provides linguistic data on the structure and features of the world’s languages, along with references.
Source.Provider: Max Planck Institute for Evolutionary Anthropology

Source.Name: Conversion Hub
Source.Description: The SSH Conversion Hub provides an inventory of solutions for conversions between data and file formats.
